name: Jeff Rogers
text: This is a new Pizza hut in Wetumpka, The old place closed and the built a new one that is very very nice, the new place is at 5228 Hwy 231S which is beside Dunkin' Donuts and Burger King..  My experience there is that they are very nice all …More

name: Crystal Martin
text: The guy that was delivering our food to us, his name was Phillip. We ordered a large supreme pizza and we wanted a 2 liter soda, unfortunately y’all were currently out of stock, no big deal. After about 30 minutes of placing my order, …More

name: Carl Jordan
text: I don't know if they were afraid of running out of toppings on game night or if they just don't care about their customers, but I won't be doing business with Pizza Hut in Wetumpka anymore. The large, 5-topping pizza I got from them tonight …More

name: Tamra Oswalt
text: The last time I ordered from Pizza hut I had ordered the garlic dipping sauce and didn't get it so I was a little disappointed so I give them four stars

name: Sheila Stephens
text: Just right.  A little expensive,  but worth it.

name: Dawn R Michael
text: The pizza I ordered had the right topping, but the crust was doughy and undercooked for the price I paid, it was like eating raw dough. I had to put it in my oven to cook it more, if I wanted to cook a pizza I would have had my husband pick up one from the store, or made my own.

name: JOHN SHELL
text: Good pizza. Not overcooked. Had the Vegetarian. Fast Service. Ate in, clean, new, really nice.

name: Olga Grant
text: Those guys are awesome! We do not go there often but when we do they always make it memorable and worth sharing the story with the friends!

text: Even though they no longer have their buffet it is still good. There are places to sit. With tables and handicap accessible

name: B Faulk
text: The staff is great. They are very friendly and helpful even if there is a problem they will go above and beyond to make it right and make sure that your pleased. The only problem is they can't keep delivery drivers, so it's just easier to …More

text:
We normally go inside to eat lunch at the Wetumpka Pizza Hut.
Always great service, very clean and I like my Pan Pizza well-done. They always get it right.

text: This location always messes something up. Sometimes it's forgotten sauce. Sometimes pizza is soggy and cut weird. Last time I found out I kept getting the wrong crust flavor because they didn't know Hut Favorite has an actual recipe. This …More

text: Been 50 min. Still waiting. Told it woild be here in 10-15 min. Over hour? New location same service.

text: their quality of pizzas have gone down so much over the years.  you could always depend on good pies but the last several pies we ordered were dry, hard & cold.

name: Rodney Davis
text: Stopped by for lunch on the way home from a trip. Staff was courteous and the restaurant clean. We had the buffet. There was a variety but it had been out for a while. The pizza was dry not moist like. Still a worthwhile stop.

name: Paul Powers
text: Whoever was making pizzas early Saturday night on 02/09/19 made us the best pizzas we've ever had from this location, and we've lived here for years. Now I feel like I've been getting ripped off all these years! It always seemed like they …More

name: John Frey
text: I ordered two pizzas on line and went to pick up the order, I paid for it at 1748, and was informed the order would be ready in three minutes and instructed to pull ahead to wait, my order would be brought to the car when ready. At 1815, I …More

name: Kathy Daniel
text: The delivery person did not ring my doorbell,  RING THE DOORBELL!!!!!!! I NOT I CANNOT HERE A KNOCK IN MY HOUSE. Don't lie and say you rang the doorbell when You know you didn't!!!!!!!!

name: Katie Valentine
text: Been in multiple times to wait 45 minutes for simple orders. Even had to cancel them due to excessive waiting, when they were clearly not busy. Half the time they dont even answer their phones. The dominos in town is a million times better and more reliable.

name: Shannon Manspeaker
text: This Pizza Hut has went down hill since they moved.My last four orders have been awful.The service was great and friendly but the food needs help.They should  keep the pizza consistent with trained employees.I won't be going to the Pizza hut in Wetumpka anymore.

name: Lindsey Henderson
text: This place just needs to close up shop.  They told us yesterday that they do the buffet on Sunday starting at 11am.  We arrive at 11:20, but there was nothing out besides wilted lettuce.  The cashier couldn't tell us when or if anything was coming out.  Waste of a drive.

name: Mitch Trout
text: First off the manager James was very rude and makes this all the worse. But anyways I put it in a delivery order and granted it was later in the evening but still well within an hour before closing, and it took well over an hour before I …More

text: There was only 3 different kinds of pizza on the buffet bar and most of it was gone what was left it was cold. It was lunch time 11:45. Salad bar had no topping selection. The waitress was very rude. 1st and last time to this pizza hut.

text: Ordered extra sauce, for one pizza and it was instead put on the other. For some reason one of the pizza's was cut unevenly twice and was practically falling apart. The crust flavoring was swapped on both pizzas. Lastly, they said it would …More

text: Placed an order online for two pizzas. Order was supposed to be ready at 7:20 pm. The food was not ready until 8:00. On top of that my order was wrong. Order was supposed to to be ready in 15mins.
